src:
Ne zamudite predavanja direktorja mobilne video oglaševalske platforme Fanbytes

04 Nov 2019, 12:00

Poznate podjetje Fanbytes? Verjetno ne. Fanbytes je mobilna video oglaševalska platforma, ki pomaga blagovnim  znamkam kot so Warner, Apple Music in Sony s pomočjo influenserjev doseči mlajšo generacijo preko socialnega omrežja Snapchat in TikTok. S svojim razumevanjem občinstva, predvsem Generacije Z, torej pomaga blagovnim znamkam kot so Deliveroo, Apple Music preko platforme Snapchat tržiti in distribuirati video posnetke in tako zagotavljati, da le-ti dosežejo pravo občinstvo ob pravem času. Direktor podjetja Fanbytes je 24-letni Timothy Armoo.
Fanbytesove kampanje so bile v reviji Forbes, Huffington Post in Times označene kot »redefiniranje družbenih pravil generacije Z«. Podjetje Fanbytes je Timovo tretje podjetje, svoje prvo podjetje pa je ustanovil že pri svojih 14 letih in svoje drugo podjetje uspešno prodal že pri svojih 17. letih. 
Tim Armoo je velik oboževalec Quora, je tudi »obseden« s TikTokom in s tem, kako kreirati nove dimenzije komunikacije z mlajšimi generacijami. Je predstavnik generacije Z ter eden izmed 100 najbolj vplivnih Londončanov. V sredo, 20. 11. 2019 (od 13. do 16. ure), bo predaval v Radisson Blu Plaza hotelu na tematiko delo z generacijo Z.

Vsebina:



Kako oglaševati, da dobimo pravi kader?


Kako mlajšim generacijam približati in narediti delovna okolja, delovne mesto bolj zanimiva?


Kakšne so karakteristike novih generacij, ki prihajajo in so že na tržišču?


voditeljstvo generacije Z


Timova osebna zgodba


Generacija Z - to je generacija, ki prihaja za milenijci, so digitalni otroci, otroci interneta kot jim tudi pravimo in so trg, ki ga želijo doseči in razumeti vse blagovne znamke. In kdo najbolje razume generacijo Z kot sami sebe? Timova ekipa ima povprečno starost 21 let, najmlajši član pa le 19 let, s čimer imajo komparativno prednost pri občinstvu, katerega naslavljajo. In kako deluje Timovo podjetje Fanbytes? Za vsako marketinško ekipo je velik izziv doseči in vključiti svojo ciljno občinstvo. 
In kaj prihaja za generacijo Z? Generacija AA, odgovarja Tim. Naša družba se spreminja v družbo podatkov, zato so tudi generacije identificirane kot Excelova preglednica.
Predavanje bo potekalo v angleškem jeziku. Prevod v slovenščino ne bo zagotovljen.
Število mest je omejeno. Predavanje je brezplačno. Prijavite se TUKAJ.
text:
Do not miss the lecture of the director of the mobile video advertising platform Fanbytes

04 Nov 2019, 12:00

Do you know Fanbytes? Probably not. Fanbytes is a mobile video advertising platform that helps brands like Warner, Apple Music and Sony reach out to the younger generation through Snapchat and TikTok through influencers. With its understanding of audiences, especially Generation Z, it helps brands like Deliveroo, Apple Music market and distribute videos through Snapchat to ensure that they reach the right audience at the right time. Fanbytes CEO is 24-year-old Timothy Armoo.
Fanbytes' campaigns have been labeled "redefining Generation Z's social rules" in Forbes, Huffington Post and Times. Fanbytes is Tim's third company, starting his first company at the age of 14 and successfully selling his second company at the age of 17.
Tim Armoo is a big fan of Quora, he is also obsessed with TikTok and how to create new dimensions of communication with younger generations. He is a representative of Generation Z and one of the 100 most influential Londoners. On Wednesday, November 20, 2019 (1pm to 4pm), he will be lecturing at the Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel on the subject of Generation Z work.

Content:



How do we advertise to get the right staff?


How to approach and make work environments more attractive to younger generations?


What are the characteristics of new and emerging generations?


leadership of Generation Z


Tim's personal story


Generation Z - This is the generation that is coming for millennials, digital kids, kids of the internet as we call them, and are the market that all brands want to reach and understand. And who best understands Generation Z as themselves? Tim's team has an average age of 21, and the youngest member is only 19, giving them a comparative advantage with the audience they are addressing. And how does Tim's Fanbytes company work? It is a great challenge for every marketing team to reach and engage their target audience.
And what's coming for Generation Z? Generation AA, Tim replies. Our company is changing into a data society, so generations are also identified as an Excel spreadsheet.
The lecture will be in English. Translation into Slovenian will not be guaranteed.
The number of places is limited. The lecture is free of charge. Sign up HERE.
